general_advisory: Current weather allows planting of pine apple. Grow variety Que, Queen, Simachalan and Maritius. Climate and weather allows planting papaya up to March. Grow variety Honey dew, Kur g honey dew, coembatore-1, Coembatore-2, Pusa delicious, Pusa majestic, Pusa dwarf and Pusa giant.

advisory: Green gram crop is at pod formation to mature stage. Due to the high regular dew fall and prevailing dry weather the Powdery mildew disease is going to aggravate in coming days. Go for foliar application of Sulphur 80% WP per liter of water. (Do not apply any fungicide on Thursday, Friday, Saturday.)
Do vaccination of goat within three months to control P.P.R disease. In case goats are affected, give them antibiotics like Siproplafaxin, Eneroflaxin and other multivitamins.

To prevent any disease or mortality problems, maintain water quality parameters: pH 7.5 to 8.5, Dissolved oxygen 5.0ppm, Temperature 25-30Â°C, total alkalinity 75-175ppm, total hardness 75-150ppm. Use CIF ABROOD of 3-5 mm diameter sinking pellet type and fed at 3-5% of body weight per day for two months prior to breeding for better growth and survival of spawn, as well as for early maturation and spawning of brooders.
